description:
Andrew Fork was a commodore of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance] who was notable for his part in the Alliance invasion of Imperial territory in mid-796 UC. He was also involved (albeit briefly) in the plot to assassinate http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli] in 800 UC.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Andrew Fork
